title: # 485 - Shane Gillis & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Shane Gillis. We talk about Shane’s new special, SNL, Norm Macdonald, the yips, crazy trip flip episodes, and much more! 

 

Shane has a new special “Live in Austin” on YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKUpf1Vx0vs 

 

Follow Shane here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/shanemgillis 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Shanemgillis 

 

This episode is brought to you by Candid. Get started for $15 at http://www.candidco.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Noom. Sign up for your trial today at http://www.noom.com/bertcast   

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert  

 

This episode is also brought to you by Helix. Get up to $200 off all mattress orders and 2 free pillows at http://www.helixsleep.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by CrowdHealth. Try for 30 days risk free and get the fitness wearable at http://www.joincrowdhealth.com/fit and use the code “BERT” at sign up. 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer
